createdataset.name: CreateDataset
createdataset.description: Grants permission to create a dataset manifest

createmodel.name: CreateModel
createmodel.description: Grants permission to create a new anomaly detection model

createproject.name: CreateProject
createproject.description: Grants permission to create a new project

deletedataset.name: DeleteDataset
deletedataset.description: Grants permission to delete a dataset

deletemodel.name: DeleteModel
deletemodel.description: Grants permission to delete a model and all associated assets

deleteproject.name: DeleteProject
deleteproject.description: Grants permission to permanently remove a project

describedataset.name: DescribeDataset
describedataset.description: Grants permission to show detailed information about dataset manifest

describemodel.name: DescribeModel
describemodel.description: Grants permission to show detailed information about a model

describemodelpackagingjob.name: DescribeModelPackagingJob
describemodelpackagingjob.description: Grants permission to show detailed information about a model packaging job

describeproject.name: DescribeProject
describeproject.description: Grants permission to show detailed information about a project

describetrialdetection.name: DescribeTrialDetection
describetrialdetection.description: Grants permission to provides state information about a running anomaly detection job

detectanomalies.name: DetectAnomalies
detectanomalies.description: Grants permission to invoke detection of anomalies

listdatasetentries.name: ListDatasetEntries
listdatasetentries.description: Grants permission to list the contents of dataset manifest

listmodelpackagingjobs.name: ListModelPackagingJobs
listmodelpackagingjobs.description: Grants permission to list all model packaging jobs associated with a project

listmodels.name: ListModels
listmodels.description: Grants permission to list all models associated with a project

listprojects.name: ListProjects
listprojects.description: Grants permission to list all projects

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

listtrialdetections.name: ListTrialDetections
listtrialdetections.description: Grants permission to list all anomaly detection jobs

startmodel.name: StartModel
startmodel.description: Grants permission to start anomaly detection model

startmodelpackagingjob.name: StartModelPackagingJob
startmodelpackagingjob.description: Grants permission to start a model packaging job

starttrialdetection.name: StartTrialDetection
starttrialdetection.description: Grants permission to start bulk detection of anomalies for a set of images stored in an S3 bucket

stopmodel.name: StopModel
stopmodel.description: Grants permission to stop anomaly detection model

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource with given key value pairs

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the tag with the given key from a resource

updatedatasetentries.name: UpdateDatasetEntries
updatedatasetentries.description: Grants permission to update a training or test dataset manifest
